description:
Fail drop_unique_constraint() (from sqlalchemy utils) on table  'instance_type_extra_specs'.
This bug affects only sqlite engine.
Sqlalchemy error message: "InvalidRequestError: This ForeignKey already has a parent !"
title: Fail in sqlalchemy utils on 'instance_type_extra_specs' table

comments.content:
Fail drop_unique_constraint() (from sqlalchemy utils) on table  'instance_type_extra_specs'.
This bug affects only sqlite engine.
Sqlalchemy error message: "InvalidRequestError: This ForeignKey already has a parent !"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yzveryanskyy

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/33954/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yzveryanskyy

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/33954
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/957a35204d131c892a7985ecbabd0769c9e5a9ea
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 957a35204d131c892a7985ecbabd0769c9e5a9ea
Author: Yuriy Zveryanskyy <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 21 14:44:50 2013 +0300

    Fix sqlalchemy utils.
    
    This patch affects drop_unique_constraint() on sqlite engine.
    1. Fix error for tables with foreign key(s).
    2. Now work with tables contains reserved words in
    column names ("key" for example).
    
    Fix bug 1195216.
    
    Change-Id: Idc4dfa5006eee115f578b00d675cae1d6241ec69
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
